amendment.description: To modify the deficit-neutral reserve fund for America's servicemembers and veterans to include leases of major medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 314 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 314 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 314 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 314 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Landrieu.
